about.header: 👋 I'm Álvaro Molina, Product Designer
about.intro: My goal is to create solutions that contribute to improving the environment around us, strive to make people's lives more comfortable, and enjoy the process a lot.
about.description: Currently, I have been working for over 2 years as a product designer at Genially, although over the past 9 years I have faced projects in UI Design, Design Systems, Animation, Web Design, and Graphic Design. Additionally, during 5 of these years, I have worked on audiovisual projects as an audiovisual technician, cinematographer, and camera operator.

current.position: Product Designer at Genially ↗
current.description: Focused on facilitating the creation of standout communication experiences in educational, academic, and professional environments through the use of effects, interactivity, and animation, proposing solutions for user experience and interface. I am involved in the entire design process, from detecting opportunities to evaluating solutions after implementation.

previous.position: UI & Design System Designer at Genially ↗
previous.description: Creating the foundations of the design system, documenting, designing key components, and defining basic design patterns. I focused on scalability and the feasibility of implementation, considering there was no design system before. During this stage, I also participated in the website design by building a modular system that allowed the content team to create pages through a customized content manager. I also contributed to redesigning various parts of the application's UI.

graphicDesigner.position: Graphic Designer at Genially ↗
graphicDesigner.description: Creating designs for creation templates of different themes, aesthetics, and contents, offered through the template catalog. I also worked on creating collections of graphic resources offered in the application's resource catalogs, proposing improvements in categorization and organization, and managing everything related to the creation and publication of these. Additionally, I collaborated with the marketing team on creating visual content for communication campaigns.

freelanceDesigner.description: Creating brands and corporate visual identities, editorial design, and motion graphics. I have also done (a little) illustration work and collaborated on some projects in web design and layout.

freelanceAudiovisual.description: Working as a cinematographer and camera operator in film, advertising, music videos, corporate videos, concerts, live events, etc. Also working as a video editor and post-producer. And some photography and video jobs at weddings, baptisms, and communions, in addition to event photography.

current.position: Collaborator at CiC-Batá ↗
current.description: Carrying out a research project to find solutions that facilitate access to technology and reduce the digital divide for older people. View conclusions ↗.

previous.position: Collaborator with AJDEM ↗
previous.description: Creating the poster for National Multiple Sclerosis Day, where I developed the idea, conducted the photo session, and composed the poster.
